description:
Job title: Creative Project Manager, 360, Fun Brand

Contract type:

Location: El Segundo

Discipline:

Remote: No

Reference: 475268

Contact name: Megan Bumgarner

Job Description

Our client, a Trendy and Popular CPG Brand, is looking for a Marketing Project Manager to support on projects across 360 marketing like digital banners, paid social, digital assets, email and more.

Hybrid, Los Angeles 2x a week near LAX

Pay – $40hr+ (w2),

3 months with extensions

40 hrs a week

Candidates MUST have experience managing creative projects including asset development from intake to delivery. Including photoshoots

Requirements:


  • at least 4 years experience with 360 campaign management, including ecommerce and marketing
  • experience production planning for video and photo shoots
  • wrike experience nice to have

qualifications.required: at least 4 years experience with 360 campaign management, including ecommerce and marketing, experience production planning for video and photo shoots, wrike experience nice to have
